name: Red Dahlia Flower
description:
Dahlias are flowers of hope and confidence, 
Bold and jolly flowers of flamboyance,
Dreamy, creamy petals of colored exuberance

We should learn to have inner strength as strong as that of Dahlia flowers. It has resilience to thrive amongst the roughest terrains and unfurl its petals from the center of the soul. Let us all rise like Dahlia flowers with grace and courage to face each new day and bloom

This painting was created on 21 Nov'2021 with wax crayon colors.
